parameters.name: CapacityStorageSize
parameters.description: The capacity of the storage-optimized storage.

parameters.name: CloudStorageSize
parameters.description: The cloud storage capacity. Unit: GB.

parameters.name: CloudStorageType
parameters.description:
The cloud storage class.

- **PerformanceStorage**: performance cloud storage.

- **StandardStorage**: standard cloud storage.

parameters.name: EnableCapacityStorage
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable storage-optimized storage.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the instance is located. To query the latest region list, call the [DescribeRegions](~~426062~~) operation.
